Bonds of Life.name: Bonds of Life
Bonds of Life.flavor: Tendrils erupt from your targetâ€™s body, entwining it and holding it fast.
keywords:
Ranged 5

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 4 vs. Reflex
Bonds of Life.attack:
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 4 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 6 vs. Reflex
Bonds of Life.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.
Bonds of Life.special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls with this power.

Twilight Stealth.name: Twilight Stealth
Twilight Stealth.flavor: With a thought, you vanish into your surroundings.
Twilight Stealth.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you are invisible to any creature against which you have any cover or concealment.

Nature's Rage.name: Nature's Rage
Nature's Rage.flavor: The world reflects your outrage, coming to life with sudden and entangling ferocity.
Nature's Rage.attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 6 vs. Reflex
Nature's Rage.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is restrained (save ends).
Nature's Rage.effect: The blast creates a zone of writhing plants that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any enemy that enters the zone is restrained (save ends).
Nature's Rage.special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls with this power.
